展.definition: to spread out; to open up; to exhibit; to put into effect; to postpone; to prolong; exhibition

展位.definition: relative position of exhibition booth; allocated floor space for display stall; allotted exhibit area

展出.definition: to put on display; to be on show; to exhibit

展列.definition: to lay out one's products; to display

展平.definition: to flatten out (paper, film, metal plates etc)

展播.definition: to exhibit as broadcast; to show (on TV)

展望.definition: outlook; prospect; to look ahead; to look forward to

展期.definition: to extend the period; to reschedule (a debt)

展玩.definition: to view close up; to examine and admire

展現.definition: to unfold before one's eyes; to emerge; to reveal; to display

展眉.definition: to beam with joy; all smiles

展示.definition: to reveal; to display; to show; to exhibit

展翅高飛.definition: to spread one's wings and soar (idiom); to develop one's abilities freely

展覽.definition: to put on display; to exhibit; exhibition; show; CL:個|个[ge4],次[ci4]

展評.definition: to display for evaluation; to exhibit and compare

展轉.definition: variant of 輾轉|辗转[zhan3 zhuan3]

展轉騰挪.definition: see 閃轉騰挪|闪转腾挪[shan3 zhuan3 teng2 nuo2]

展銷.definition: to display and sell (e.g. at a fair); sales exhibition

展開.definition: to unfold; to spread out; to open up; to launch; to carry out

展陳.definition: to exhibit; to display; exhibition; display
